availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Logan County, Kentucky blacksmith. Kentucky native. Son of Obediah Smith and Matilda Smith. Married Mary E. McElmore Smith in 1862.

bibl.p: Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Logan County, District 1, p. 30. Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Logan County, District 1, p. 134. Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Simpson County, Green Precinct, p. 26. Jordan Dodd, comp., Kentucky Marriages, 1851-1900, Ancestry, Logan County, 1862. “S. H. Smith,” Find A Grave, memorial no. 60247356 (accessed May 26, 2017).
